PrecisAppointment of MICHEL FAURE, of Westmount, Quebec, and GIRARD LANDRY, of Trois-Rivi√®res-Ouest, Quebec, as full-time members of the Convention Refugee Determination Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montreal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective July 6, 1998.
